name: Marble Odyssey
descr:
[b]Marble Odyssey[/b] follows the journey of Odie, a marble lost on a chain of mysterious ocean islands. Thrust into a series of tests of dexterity, speed and quick thinking as he attempts to rescue himself and his kidnapped friends. Each of the Odyssey's initial 40 levels, offer a blend of treasure hunt, time trial, rescue mission and more. It's your challenge to navigate each levels goals, and achieve the perfect score.

[b]Features[/b]
[list][li] 40 Levels of action
[/li][li] Each level needs a combination of speed, marble rescue and point collection to win.
[/li][li] Some levels are guarded by Baddies, marbles warped to evil that will try and thwart your progress!
[/li][li] Special powers allow your marble to [b]Jump[/b], [b]Brake[/b] and [b]Turbo speed[/b].
[/li][li] Pit yourself against a range of challenges, including perilous ledges, chasm spanning jumps and pinball table elements (Plus more!).
[/li][li] [b]Marble Skins[/b] can be achieved by rescuing your marble comrades, others can be bought. Try  to collect them all across your adventures.
[/li][li] Unique Marble skins, available from the Steam store, will allow you to expand your Marble collection and express your individuality.
[/li][li] Future Level packs, will offer even more tests of dexterity, quick-thinking and speed.[/li][/list]
detail:
名称: Marble Odyssey
类型: 动作, 休闲, 独立
开发商: Dot Product Games
发行商: Dot Product Games
发行日期: 2020 年 9 月 23 日
抢先体验发行日期: 2019 年 9 月 9 日
review: 全部评测: 无用户评测
全部评测: 无用户评测

Windows

处理器: Intel® Core i3 540 or AMD A6-3620 or higher

显卡: Direct X 11.0 compliant video card with 4GB RAM (NVidia GeForce 980 or AMD Radeon 6850)
DirectX 版本: 11
网络: 宽带互联网连接

声卡: DirectX compatible sound card
